DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Oxaloacetate ( OAA ) safe effective treatment Parkinson 's disease . Each subject ask make 3 study visit complete two safety follow-up phone call 4 month period .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Oxaloacetate Subjects With Treated PD
DOC.criteria: Able give inform consent follow instruction per protocol Diagnosis idiopathic PD within 7 year diagnosis Taking stable dos levodopa would predictably need adjustment PD medication 4 month Unified Parkinson 's Disease Rating Scale ( UPDRS ) II + III least 30 point baseline Previously take Oxaloacetate Participation drug study use investigational product within 30 day prior baseline In Investigator 's opinion , unstable clinically significant condition would impair subject ' ability comply study followup Other know suspect cause parkinsonism
